text: Supermodel Bella Hadid is sick and tired of rumours she's altered her looks with plastic surgery, challenging anyone who doubts her. ` ` People think I got all this surgery or did this or that. And you know what? We can do a scan of my face, darling,'' she told InStyle. Hadid started modelling at the age of 16, and throughout her career has been accused of having several cosmetic procedures done, including a nose job and filler injections. ` ` I'm scared of putting fillers into my lips,'' she said. ` ` I wouldn't want to mess up my face.''
